public int transformAngle(int angle)
Transforms the specified angle to the range from -180 to +180.

Parameters:

Returns:
the angle in range from -180 to +180

driveAngle

public void driveAngle(int desiredAngle,
                       DriveAngleMode mode)
Drives to the desired angle and holds it until a new command arrives.

Parameters:
desiredAngle - the angle to drive, relative to the boat
mode - determines which sensor is used for calculation.
